ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This packaging identifier (e.g. kit number, bottle label, vial identifier) may be collected in different ways (e.g. affixing label onto CRF or scanning a bar code). For some study dosing regimens, greater granularity for treatment identifiers may be needed.
